items.text: opens the face of the bat and gets it wide of short third man
items.postText: Hemant takes over on commentary now.
items.shortText: Williams to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: short and pulled away towards deep square leg for a single
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: a tad fuller, Imrul comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: tossed up this time but down the leg side
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 wide

items.text: short and wide and Imrul cuts it away for a couple of runs, sweeper cover tidies it up
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.text: length ball, Imrul goes back and punches it through covers for a walking single
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: a touch fuller outside off, Soumya was playing back and in the end lets it go
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: down the track and drills it straight back at his partner, gets a single but Imrul is in some pain here. The physio is out and is tending to him. It hit him on the left forearm
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Md Iqbal: "I like to say Liton is the best to open with Tamim and then Imrul Soumya musfique sakib Mamudullah Notun mashrafe Saif Uddin mustafiz" joynul: "What's the record of most runs by a batsman in a 3 match bilateral series? " -- 360 by Babar Azam. Here's the full list.
items.text: down the track and slaps this length ball past mid-off for a boundary
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: back of length outside off, dabbed towards third man
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Raiyan Ferdous : "After how many international innings has soumya scored a fifty in this format?" -- His last 50-plus score was against Ireland in 2017
items.text: length ball, stands tall and punches it past the diving extra cover who gets some hand on it, mid-off eventually cuts it off
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: short of length, down the leg side, pulled away towards fine leg, Zhuwao makes a tumbling stop there to keep it to just one
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: another bouncer, around middle and leg, Imrul ducks under it comfortably
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length ball, down the leg side and this one needs to be bowled again
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 wide

items.text: length ball, just outside off, punched towards covers
items.postText:
Trihan: "Bangladesh should stick to Soumya and try to tune him up well before the world cup and keep Imrul in the team too even if he plays a couple of bad games. World Cup XI - 1.Tamim 2.Liton 3.Shakib/Soumya 4.Mushfiqur 5.Imrul/Shakib 6.Mahmudullah 7. Soumya/Saifuddin 8.Mehedi 9.Mashrafe 10.Mustafiz 11.Rubel * "/" stands for exceptional situations* "

Khaled: "Someone wanted to Jinx Imrul. Guess it didn work"
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, flat-bats it back, the ball hits the stumps at the other end
items.shortText: Ngarava to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: it's a no-ball and Soumya has dispatched it over midwicket for a one-bounce four. However, replays show the umpire got it wrong, the bowler had some part of his foot behind the line. Unlucky there, but a free-hit coming up
items.shortText: Ngarava to Soumya Sarkar, (no ball) FOUR runs

items.text: full and wide, Soumya looks to go big but fails to connect
items.shortText: Ngarava to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: down the track and cuts it over covers, the fielder is there in the deep
items.shortText: Ngarava to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: a touch fuller and punched through covers, the sweeper cover makes a sliding stop to his left
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.text: length ball, punched off the back foot but extra cover cuts it off
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: slower one, around middle and off, tucked away towards square leg
items.postText: Kalindost: "Why virat kholi name is mentioned in the list of highest scorer in 3 odi series?? Isnt ind vs wi series 5 odi series??" -- That list is of players who played three or less games in the series
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: length ball, on the pads, glanced towards short fine leg
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: length again, on the pads, played gently towards square leg
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length ball, around off, Imrul turns it away towards deep square leg
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run
